Returns true iff this move is a pass.

Move returned by get_move() method as side-effect.
Move - class Move.
Move for Gthd, GthClient.
Move() - Constructor for class Move
Create a move object which is a pass.
Move(int, int) - Constructor for class Move
Create a move object from a coordinate pair in internal form.
Move(String) - Constructor for class Move
Create a move object from a description of the form "coord" where "coord" is an algebraic square number or the string "pass".
my_time - Variable in class GthClient
Number of seconds the client has currently remaining, if playing under time controls.

N

O

Number of seconds the client's opponent has currently remaining, if playing under time controls.

STATE_DONE - Static variable in class GthClient

T

WHO_BLACK - Static variable in class GthClient
Player is black.
WHO_NONE - Static variable in class GthClient
Player is nobody.
WHO_OTHER - Static variable in class GthClient

WHO_WHITE - Static variable in class GthClient

winner - Variable in class GthClient
If done, player which won.

X

x - Variable in class Move
Square coordinates in the range 0-4, 0-4, where the first coordinate is the column (x) value, and the second is the row (y) value.

Y

y - Variable in class Move
Square coordinates in the range 0-4, 0-4, where the first coordinate is the column (x) value, and the second is the row (y) value.
